languages.text: {n}Идира шмыгает носом. Озирается по сторонам. Потом потирает руки, дергает головой и, наконец, кивает.{/n} "Ну да. Меня тут для того и держали, так-то. Так что, если что... подналягу на дверку в башке плечом, высуну ухо и послушаю, что там в {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варпе{/g} за вас трут". {n}Идира скалится, словно уже услышала какую-то сальную подробность про вас.{/n} "Изволите прямо сейчас послушать?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира шмыгает носом. Озирается по сторонам. Потом потирает руки, дергает головой и, наконец, кивает.{/n} "Ну да. Меня тут для того и держали, так-то. Так что, если что... подналягу на дверку в башке плечом, высуну ухо и послушаю, что там в варпе за вас трут". {n}Идира скалится, словно уже услышала какую-то сальную подробность про вас.{/n} "Изволите прямо сейчас послушать?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉皱了皱鼻子，环顾四周。随后她擦擦手，摇了摇头，最后又点了点头。{/n}“没问题，毕竟我就是干这个的。所以，我只要……靠在脑子里的那扇门上，竖起耳朵，听听{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}是怎么评价你的就好了。”{n}伊迪拉咧嘴笑了起来，仿佛已经听到了某些暧昧的细节。{/n}“如果你愿意的话，我现在就可以听，好吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

languages.original_text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the warp's got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

languages.text: {n}Idira arruga la nariz y mira alrededor. Después, se frota las manos, menea la cabeza y, por fin, asiente.{/n} «De acuerdo. Para eso estoy aquí, ¿no? Venga, voy a... acercarme un poco más a esa puerta en mi cabeza, abrir bien las orejas y escuchar lo que la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} tiene que decir sobre usted». {n}Idira sonríe, como si ya hubiera oído un detalle jugoso.{/n} «Si me lo permite, puedo hacerlo ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

Venga, voy a... acercarme un poco más a esa puerta en mi cabeza, abrir bien las orejas y escuchar lo que la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g} tiene que decir sobre usted». {n}Idira sonríe, como si ya hubiera oído un detalle jugoso.{/n} «Si me lo permite, puedo hacerlo ahora mismo».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}イディラは鼻にしわを寄せ、あたりを見回す。そして手を拭い、頭を振って、最後にうなずいた。{/n}「わかったわ。そのためにここに来たんだもの。だから、あたいはただ…もう少し頭の中の扉に寄りかかって、耳を立てて、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}が告げる陛下に関することに耳を傾けてみるわね」{n}イディラは、すでに淫らな話でも聞いたかのようにニヤリと笑う。{/n}「もし許してくれるなら、今から聞いてもいいかしら？」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは鼻にしわを寄せ、あたりを見回す。そして手を拭い、頭を振って、最後にうなずいた。{/n}「わかったわ。そのためにここに来たんだもの。だから、あたいはただ…もう少し頭の中の扉に寄りかかって、耳を立てて、{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}歪み{/g}が告げる陛下に関することに耳を傾けてみるわね」{n}イディラは、すでに淫らな話でも聞いたかのようにニヤリと笑う。{/n}「もし許してくれるなら、今から聞いてもいいかしら？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira rümpft die Nase und blickt sich um. Dann wischt sie sich die Hände ab, schüttelt den Kopf und nickt schließlich.{/n} "Also schön. Darum bin ich schließlich hier. Also werde ich mich einfach ... noch ein wenig an die Tür in meinem Kopf lehnen, die Ohren spitzen und hören, was der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} über Euch zu sagen hat." {n}Idira grinst, als hätte sie schon ein schlüpfriges Detail vernommen.{/n} "Wenn Ihr es gestattet, darf ich dann jetzt sofort lauschen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira rümpft die Nase und blickt sich um. Dann wischt sie sich die Hände ab, schüttelt den Kopf und nickt schließlich.{/n} "Also schön. Darum bin ich schließlich hier. Also werde ich mich einfach ... noch ein wenig an die Tür in meinem Kopf lehnen, die Ohren spitzen und hören, was der {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} über Euch zu sagen hat." {n}Idira grinst, als hätte sie schon ein schlüpfriges Detail vernommen.{/n} "Wenn Ihr es gestattet, darf ich dann jetzt sofort lauschen?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Idira plisse le nez en jetant des regards alentour, puis elle se frotte les mains et secoue légèrement la tête avant d'acquiescer.{/n} « D'accord. C'est pour ça que je suis là, après tout. Je vais donc... m'approcher de la porte dans ma tête, tendre l'oreille et écouter ce que le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} a à dire à votre sujet. » {n}Idira sourit de toutes ses dents, comme si elle avait déjà entendu des détails salaces.{/n} « Je peux même écouter maintenant, si ça vous dit ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira plisse le nez en jetant des regards alentour, puis elle se frotte les mains et secoue légèrement la tête avant d'acquiescer.{/n} « D'accord. C'est pour ça que je suis là, après tout. Je vais donc... m'approcher de la porte dans ma tête, tendre l'oreille et écouter ce que le {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} a à dire à votre sujet. » {n}Idira sourit de toutes ses dents, comme si elle avait déjà entendu des détails salaces.{/n} « Je peux même écouter maintenant, si ça vous dit ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}İdira, burnunu buruşturarak etrafa bakıyor. Ardından ellerini ovuşturuyor, kafasını bir sallıyor ve nihayet başıyla onaylıyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Sonuçta bunun için buradayım. Yapacağım şey şu: Zihnimdeki kapıya biraz daha yaslanacağım ve kulak kabartıp {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyutun{/g} senin hakkında söyleyeceklerini dinleyeceğim." {n}İdira, seninle alakalı müstehcen bir şey duymuş gibi sırıtıyor.{/n} "İzin verirsen başlıyorum, oldu mu?"
languages.original_text: {n}Idira wrinkles her nose and looks around. Then she wipes her hands, gives her head a shake, and finally nods.{/n} "All right. That's what I'm here for, after all. So, I'm just going to... lean on that door in my head a little more, prick up my ears, and listen to what the {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g}'s got to say about you." {n}Idira grins like she's already heard some salacious detail.{/n} "If you'll allow it, I can listen right now?"

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, burnunu buruşturarak etrafa bakıyor. Ardından ellerini siliyor, kendine gelerek başıyla onay veriyor.{/n} "Pekâlâ. Sonuçta bunun için buradayım. Şimdi şöyle yapacağım... Zihnimdeki kapıya biraz daha yaslanacağım ve kulaklarımı dört açıp {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öteboyut{/g}un senin hakkında söyleyeceklerini dinleyeceğim." {n}İdira, seninle ilgili müstehcen ayrıntılar duymuş gibi sırıtıyor.{/n} "İzin verirsen hemen dinlemeye başlıyorum, olur mu?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
